A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a mess. To long\, entire plot line didnt need to exist\, stupid cgi characters for the sake of it\, by the time it got to anything interesting i was to bored an underwhelmed to enjoy it. Honestly the whole codebreaker casino plotline was just ridiculous and probably the main reason the movie sucked so hard. Also did we really need to see luke skywalker milk and alien for green milk?????
